channel.title: Wireless SD Memory Card on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Wireless SD Memory Card on 0x000216

item.title: WiFi in a Memory Card
item.description:
You don’t often see an SD memory card with an FCC ID, but this one is special. It’s not just a 2GB memory card; it’s also a WiFi transmitter. Set it up on your computer with the included USB adapter, then put it in your camera. Now, whenever you’re within range of your home network, your pictures will automatically upload to your computer or your favorite online photo sharing site. It’s like magic!..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/wifi-in-a-memory-card/
